name: Patchwork Neon Shibori Scarves
description:
Thick machine knit Merino scarves hand dyed with natural Indigo and finished with neon thread.

The panels in these scarves are individually dyed using different Shibori techniques, then accented with solid areas of deep indigo and the materials original colour, cream.

Patchwork scarves will always be different to each other! 

One scarf will be listed here and the other on etsy. The one listed here has the zig zag pattern on the end. You can find my etsy shop here https://www.etsy.com/shop/BindandFold

Scarves measure approx 40cm X 180cm

Hand dyed with natural Indigo and made in Melbourne.

The scarf you purchase will be the one shown. 

Small imperfections visible in the dyed surface is considered the mark of a handmade item and is not a flaw, but part of the creative process.

Please be aware that Indigo may rub onto skin or clothes for the first few wears. Scarves should be washed separately to other items. 

Hand wash in lukewarm water
do not soak
do not wring
lay flat to dry in shade.

TIP: to get excess water out of your scarf, roll it up inside a towel and press gently before laying flat to dry.

name: Indigo Itajime Silk Scarves
description:
90 x 90 cm Indigo Silk scarves, hand dyed with natural Indigo.

The scarf you purchase will not be the one shown. Please be aware that due to running different Indigo vats the colour of your scarf may not be the same as the photo. Some may be slighty lighter in shade, or darker in shade than those shown. 

Small imperfections visible in the dyed surface is considered the mark of a handmade item and is not a flaw, but part of the creative process.

Please be aware that Indigo may rub onto skin or clothes for the first few wears. Scarves should be washed separately to other items. 

Hand wash in cold water
do not soak
do not wring
lay flat to dry in shade.

If this item is sold out and you'd like to order one, please shoot through a quick email to vic@bindandfold.com. I can dye one within a few days of ordering :)

name: Indigo Cushion
description:
Indigo dyed cushion with Neon contrast stitching around zip. 

45 x 45cm

Made from 100% Linen and hand dyed and sewn in Melbourne.

Inserts not included. For a plump cushion use 50 x50cm cushion inserts, for a flatter look use an insert the same as the cover size.

If you would also like inserts, please email for price and a shipping quote!
Free shipping does not apply to inserts.

name: Neon Shibori Silk Scarves
description:
90 x 90 cm Indigo Silk scarves with neon detail. 

Hand dyed with natural Indigo and hand painted / stamped using water based textile paints. 

The scarf you purchase will not be the one shown. Please be aware that due to running different Indigo vats the colour of your scarf may not be the same as the photo. Some may be slightly lighter in shade, or darker in shade than those shown. 

Small imperfections visible in the dyed surface is considered the mark of a handmade item and is not a flaw, but part of the creative process.

Please be aware that Indigo may rub onto skin or clothes for the first few wears. Scarves should be washed separately to other items. 

Arashi with Small squares (in stock) - the current instock scarf has a different Arashi design to the one pictured. It more closely resembles the Arashi on the first picture.

Hand wash in cold water
do not soak
do not wring
lay flat to dry in shade.

name: Indigo Fabric Baskets or Planter Sacks
description:
Made from 100% cotton canvas and dyed with natural Indigo.

Some baskets have hand painted or stamped neon details, and all are stitched with neon thread for a pop of colour.

Baskets can be height adjusted by folding the top down and are fully reversible!

Approx Sizing (Unfolded - full height)

Small 
Base - 14cm
Height - 13cm

Medium 
Base - 16cm
Height - 17cm

LARGE
Base - 22cm
Height - 24cm

JUMBO
Base - 28cm
Height - 26cm

Hand made and dyed in Melbourne.

Fabric baskets are spot wash only.

Please note that the basket you receive will not be the same as the one pictured so if you want to check if a specific colour or style is in stock, please email via the contact page before ordering.

options.name: Small with red neon paint detail

description:
Thick machine knit Merino scarves hand dyed with natural Indigo and finished with neon thread.

This is a new thicker Merino scarf base than used previously.

Scarves measure approx 40cm X 150cm

Hand dyed with natural Indigo and made in Melbourne.

The scarf you purchase will not be the one shown. Please be aware that due to running different Indigo vats the colour of your scarf may not be the same as the photo. Some may be slighty lighter in shade, or darker in shade than those shown. 

Small imperfections visible in the dyed surface is considered the mark of a handmade item and is not a flaw, but part of the creative process.

Please be aware that Indigo may rub onto skin or clothes for the first few wears. Scarves should be washed separately to other items. 

Hand wash in lukewarm water
do not soak
do not wring
lay flat to dry in shade.

TIP: to get excess water out of your scarf, roll it up inside a towel and press gently before laying flat to dry.

name: Indigo Dip Dyed Vessels - Gemma Patford Collab
description:
Hand Dyed Indigo Cotton Rope Vessels

I was lucky enough to collaborate with local crafter / artist Gemma Patford on these hand dyed natural indigo cotton rope vessels. 

Please note the last remaining vessel listed is solid indigo.


LARGE 
Opening: 20cm across the middle 
Base: 14cm across the middle 
Height: 10cm

MEDIUM TO LARGE 
Opening: 19cm across the middle 
Base: 12cm across the middle 
Height: 7cm

MEDIUM 
Opening: 16cm across the middle 
Base: 8cm across the middle 
Height: 7cm

SMALL TO MEDIUM 
Opening: 14cm across the middle 
Base: 7cm across the middle 
Height: 5cm

SMALL 
Opening: 13cm across the middle 
Base: 7cm across the middle 
Height: 3cm

TINY 
Opening: 11.5cm across the middle 
Base: 5.5cm across the middle 
Height: 2cm

All vessels are hand made in Melbourne. Each item is different, no two items are the same. 

If you would like your item gift wrapped, be sure to let me know in the checkout comments.

Please be aware that items dyed with Indigo may rub onto skin or clothes.

name: Arashi Silk Scarf
description:
This stunning Arashi Shibori scarf has been hand dyed with natural Indigo. 

Arashi is the name for the process of binding cloth around a cylinder and compressing, and originated in Japan.

This scarf measures approx 90cm x 90cm and has hand rolled edges, and is made with near opaque 8mm silk. It is soft and floaty with a medium drape and is perfect for all seasons.

Square scarves are very versatile and can be worn a number of different ways around your neck or over your hair.

Hand dyed in Melbourne in my home studio. Each scarf is individually dyed, so will have it's own unique characteristics, and the scarf you receive may look slightly different from the one pictured.

Hand wash in cool water only, low iron when almost dry.

name: Naturally Dyed Gloves
description:
Deliciously warm hand dyed merino fingerless gloves.

Made from 100% Merino these gloves are made from 2 layers of merino jersey and are hand dyed with a range of natural dyes.

Gloves are available in Indigo, Cochineal (red) and Madder (earthy pink) and are OSFM.

Hand dyed in Melbourne in my home studio. Each glove is individually dyed, so will have it's own unique characteristics, and the glove you receive may look slightly different from the one pictured.

Hand wash in cool/ warm water only, lay flat to dry. No ironing required.

Please note that items dyed with Indigo may rub off onto skin or clothes.

name: Arashi Indigo Cowl
description:
This stunning Arashi Shibori hand dyed and handmade cowl or infinity scarf has been dyed with Natural Indigo.

Breezy lines of white and deep shades of indigo meander along the length of the scarf, with a single line running around the circumference. Arashi is the name for the technique of wrapping cloth around a pipe and binding it to create a resist, originating in Japan.

This scarf measures approx 38cm x 180cm and has french seams on the long hem, and is made with luxurious silk / cotton blend fabric. It is soft and floaty with a medium drape and is perfect for all seasons.

It's long enough to wear looped around the neck up to 3 times.

Hand dyed in Melbourne in my home studio. Each scarf is individually dyed by me, so will have it's own unique characteristics, and the scarf you receive may look slightly different from the one pictured.

Hand wash in cool water only, warm iron when almost dry.

name: Gift Certificate
description:
Choose from a range of gift certificate prices by selecting an option below.

Gift certificates include gift wrapping, so when the recipient receives their choice of item, it's just like you gave it to them.

Once your order has been placed I will contact you with a unique code to provide to your gift recipient. 

Gift certificates are valid for 6 months from date of purchase, are non refundable and cannot be exchanged for cash.

If you'd like to purchase a higher amount for a gift certificate, get in touch on vic@bindandfold.com

name: Custom Scarf for Helen
description:
Dark Indigo Arashi Scarf on light weight merino base measuring approx 45cm x 165cm. Finished with neon edges.

Work to begin the week of Jan 6 2014.
